data.message: someone hacked my account .and post bad bio and likes bad page .and also hacked my gmail account.. how can i prevent  hacking ,please help me ..

replies.message: Hi, Nahiyaan. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. Privacy Basics is an easy-to-navigate educational center where you can learn how to control your experience on Facebook and manage your information. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2i7aX3d. -Rhea
